objects.title: S. 1444: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013
objects.title_without_number: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013
titles: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under part A of the Medicare Program on a reasonable cost basis for anesthesia services furnished by an anesthesiologist in certain rural hospitals in the same manner as payments are provided for anesthesia services furnished by anesthesiologist assistants and certified anesthetists in such hospitals.
